The worst part of this is of course "recognised a plotline"
Recognised a plotline and suddenly realised I was watching a Brit remake of Who's The Boss. I was very ashamed at 2am on a school night.
The best thing tho is when this happens accidentally. As a teen I watched several eps of a show called The Upper Hand on YTV
A fun game is to watch a remake of a show you've already seen and see how long it takes your spouse to realise it and get real mad.
